statements: SELECT * FROM lead_contacts;
SELECT name, email FROM lead_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lead_contacts WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT phone_number, email, company_name FROM lead_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM lead_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number, company_name FROM lead_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lead_contacts WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT id, name FROM lead_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM lead_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT name, company_name FROM lead_contacts ORDER BY company_name ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM leads WHERE company = 'Tech Inc';
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT id, name, address FROM companies WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, company FROM leads WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM leads ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, company FROM leads WHERE company='ABC Company' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, company FROM leads WHERE id IN (3, 7, 10) OR company='XYZ Corp' ORDER BY company, name DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM leads WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY phone_number;
SELECT c.name, c.industry, l.name AS lead_name FROM companies c JOIN leads l ON c.id = l.id ORDER BY c.name ASC, lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Leads ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, name, company_name FROM Leads WHERE company_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT contact_id, name, email, job_title FROM Contacts ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Leads ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT lead_id, name, company_name FROM Leads JOIN Contacts ON Leads.lead_id = Contacts.lead_id WHERE Contacts.name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT DISTINCT company_name, location FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Finance' ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT Contacts.contact_id, Contacts.name, Leads.name AS lead_name, Companies.company_name FROM Contacts JOIN Leads ON Contacts.lead_id = Leads.lead_id JOIN Companies ON Leads.company_name = Companies.company_name;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM leads;
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE company_country = 'USA';
SELECT employee_name, employee_phone FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, company_name FROM leads INNER JOIN companies ON leads.company_name = companies.company_name;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, company_name FROM leads WHERE company_name = 'Tech Inc';
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE company_country = 'USA' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone, company_name FROM leads WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_email, c.company_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN companies c ON e.company_id = c.company_id WHERE e.employee_phone LIKE '123%';

SELECT a.activity_type, a.activity_date, l.lead_name, e.employee_name FROM activities a INNER JOIN leads l ON a.lead_id = l.lead_id INNER JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE a.activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND a.activity_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM LeadContacts;
SELECT id, name, email FROM LeadContacts WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT id, company_name, phone_number FROM LeadContacts ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LeadStatus WHERE status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM LeadInteractions WHERE lead_id = 123;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM LeadContacts;
SELECT * FROM LeadInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(id) AS lead_count FROM LeadContacts GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT lc.name, ls.status, li.interaction_date FROM LeadContacts lc JOIN LeadStatus ls ON lc.id = ls.id JOIN LeadInteractions li ON lc.id = li.lead_id;
SELECT lt.tag_name, COUNT(lc.id) AS tag_count FROM LeadContacts lc JOIN LeadTags lt ON lc.id = lt.id GROUP BY lt.tag_name ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
